I decided to give this a shot. At the very least I wanted the cream to help get rid of the bags. My foundation and concealer have been getting trapped in my under eye and it looks horrible. But after about a month of using this product there had been no change at all, in any area of my eye. So upset I wasted so much money on something that doesn’t work.

review_text: Ugh . I wanted to love this so bad . And I kept giving it another chance only to end up feeling pretty bummed still . While the packaging is nice, pretty pale pink frosted glass bottles, and the scent is lovely (personally prefer the serum scent over the cream scent but feel like the cream slightly does more than the serum) as well as a lovely feeling product texture before and after applying, it just did not do much for me. Like at all. Yeah my skin looks shinier (not necessarily a good thing depending on how shiny either technically but I am wondering if that is just me applying too much at once or something) and I guess my skin is brighter but as far as fine lines, dark circles (if that was included in what it was supposed to help with) and helping imperfections (uneven skin tones, dark spots, dark circles, etc etc) I feel like this is just making those imprefections hydrated feeling, BRIGHTER & more noticable than they were without putting product on. Skin less dull looking (a little) but rest of the imperfections are looking like center stage. I don’t know. this product just didn’t do it for me and maybe that has some to do with the fact I started out using the premier Cru line which is significantly more expensive than this one, but I actually felt more satisfied with the results immediately even & felt that line lived up better to what the products claims of doing. I’ll maybe keep trying it here and there, MAYBE, just until I feel like I’m not wasting way too much of it if I stop using but I do not foresee recommending it or definitely not purchasing. #freeproduct #tryitwithtopbox
product_name: Resveratrol Lift Retinol Alternative Firming Cashmere Moisturizer

review_text: I have sensitive, combination skin and bought this serum months ago to combat texture and clogged pores. After a few weeks, I noticed my skin was more even in tone, brighter, and had less clogged pores and texture especially on my forehead where I am most prone to texture. However, I do notice that my occasional breakouts were worse, especially during that time of the month. I am also more prone to hyper pigmentation, something that was never a problem for me before using the serum. It doesn’t sting and the scent I don’t really notice at all.

I would think they could suspend it in something to give it a more usable consistency - aloe maybe? I have applied it at night and followed with some hyaluronic serum. review_text_clean: i have very normal skin nothing oily or too dry until this product. i love the martian water gel toner it’s incredible and i seen these two are “perfect pairs“. after the first day of using it my skin looked bright and luminous but it’s been over 4-5 days and i have texture all over my face. my skin is dry as can be and has little texture bumps all over. mainly on the tops of my cheeks and jawline (so not hormonal).
